Sentencas: Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 (CGO) barrier layers are required to mitigate the chemical reactions between Sr-containing oxygen electrode materials and Zr-based oxygen ion conductors in high-temperature solid oxide cells.
Titulo: Processing of Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ barrier layers for solid oxide cells: The effect of preparation method and thickness on the interdiffusion and electrochemical performance

Sentencas: Barrier layers produced by different methods were studied in this work.
Titulo: Processing of Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ barrier layers for solid oxide cells: The effect of preparation method and thickness on the interdiffusion and electrochemical performance

Sentencas: As a reference, a cell with no barrier layer was measured.
Titulo: Processing of Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ barrier layers for solid oxide cells: The effect of preparation method and thickness on the interdiffusion and electrochemical performance

Sentencas: The application of the powder-processed barrier layers, considerably increases the performance.
Titulo: Processing of Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ barrier layers for solid oxide cells: The effect of preparation method and thickness on the interdiffusion and electrochemical performance

Sentencas: For further comparison, thin and dense CGO layers were produced by a low-temperature spray pyrolysis process.
Titulo: Processing of Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ barrier layers for solid oxide cells: The effect of preparation method and thickness on the interdiffusion and electrochemical performance

Sentencas: Three different thicknesses were evaluated: similar to 300 nm, similar to 700 nm and similar to 1500 nm.
Titulo: Processing of Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ barrier layers for solid oxide cells: The effect of preparation method and thickness on the interdiffusion and electrochemical performance

Sentencas: The best performance was found for the similar to 700 nm thick CGO barrier layer.
Titulo: Processing of Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ barrier layers for solid oxide cells: The effect of preparation method and thickness on the interdiffusion and electrochemical performance

Sentencas: It showed low ohmic and polarisation resistances.
Titulo: Processing of Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ barrier layers for solid oxide cells: The effect of preparation method and thickness on the interdiffusion and electrochemical performance

Sentencas: The low thickness and high density of the CGO barrier layer were found to be the important factors.
Titulo: Processing of Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ barrier layers for solid oxide cells: The effect of preparation method and thickness on the interdiffusion and electrochemical performance

Sentencas: The cells with the similar to 700 nm CGO barrier layers were also evaluated for their electrolysis performance as well as fuel cell durability.
Titulo: Processing of Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ barrier layers for solid oxide cells: The effect of preparation method and thickness on the interdiffusion and electrochemical performance
